Talents.Name: Preaching
Talents.Description: When dealing lethal damage, leave the enemy with 1 HP and inflict Critically Wounded (gives +2 SP to the attacker when killed); <Operator Name> will not attack Critically Wounded targets

Talents.Name: Clear Mind
Talents.Description: When HP falls below 40%, gains 70% Physical Dodge and restores 5% of Max HP per second, lasting for 15 seconds. Can only activate once
